parameters.name: Clearance
parameters.description: Distance between the tool body and target body (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Exclude
parameters.description: True to exclude the selections, false to include the selections

parameters.name: ClrDir
parameters.description: True to leave the direction of clearance as is, false to reverse the direction of the clearance

parameters.name: Cut
parameters.description: True to cut the target body, false to not

parameters.name: CutDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the cut if the tool body is a surface, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertIndent
description: Inserts an indent feature using a selected target body and tool body regions.
signature:
Feature InsertIndent( 
   System.Double
Thickness
,
   System.Double
Clearance
,
   System.Boolean
Exclude
,
   System.Boolean
ClrDir
,
   System.Boolean
Cut
,
   System.Boolean
CutDir
)

parameters.name: Clearance
parameters.description: Distance between the tool body and target body (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Exclude
parameters.description: True to exclude the selections, false to include the selections

parameters.name: ClrDir
parameters.description: True to leave the direction of clearance as is, false to reverse the direction of the clearance

parameters.name: Cut
parameters.description: True to cut the target body, false to not

parameters.name: CutDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the cut if the tool body is a surface, false to not

remarks:
Prior to calling this method, you must have selected the target body and tool body regions, using these selection marks:
Target body = 1
Tool body region = 4
